Name: OpsLevel - Create Deploy Event - Powershell

Parameters.Name: OL_SERVICE
Parameters.Label: Service
Parameters.HelpText: The service alias for the event

Parameters.Name: OL_DEPLOY_NUMBER
Parameters.Label: Deploy Number

Parameters.Name: OL_DEPLOY_URL
Parameters.Label: Deploy URL
Parameters.HelpText: The deploy url of the event

Parameters.Name: OL_DEDUP_ID
Parameters.Label: Dedup Id
Parameters.HelpText: The dedup id for the event

Parameters.Name: OL_DEPLOYER_EMAIL
Parameters.Label: Deployer Email

Parameters.Name: OL_DEPLOYER_NAME
Parameters.Label: Deployer Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the deployer who created the event
